remarks: A series indexed by ` NN ` with only odd terms.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
sumnnodd.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : NN --> CC ) $.
sumnnodd.even0 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. NN /\ ( k / 2 ) e. NN ) -> ( F ` k ) = 0 ) $.
sumnnodd.sc $e |- ( ph -> seq 1 ( + , F ) ~~> B ) $.
sumnnodd $p |- ( ph -> ( seq 1 ( + , ( k e. NN |-> ( F ` ( ( 2 x. k ) - 1 ) ) ) ) ~~> B /\ sum_ k e. NN ( F ` k ) = sum_ k e. NN ( F ` ( ( 2 x. k ) - 1 ) ) ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d k ph $.
